topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Object Brokering :: CORBA

name: XOTS - CORBA Transaction Service
short_description: xots is a C++-implementation of the CORBA Object Transaction Service. The xots  encompasses features such as implicit context propagation, interposition and non-interposition, stable logging, recovery and support for XA resources such as DBMSs and Qs
